title: Duke's Handbook of Medicinal Plants of the Bible

Following the successful format of his other CRC handbooks, DukeÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s Handbook of Medicinal Plants of the Bible contains 150 herbs listed alphabetically and by scientific name. Each entry provides illustrations of the plant, family line information, synonyms, notes, common names, activities, indications, dosages, downsides and interactions, natural history, and extracts.
